i1.name: Fury_of_the_North
description: {{sbc|Innate - Icebreaker:}} Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by '''Sejuani''' are marked ''Frozen'' for the disable's duration. '''Sejuani's''' next [[basic attack]] or [[champion ability|ability]] against a ''Frozen'' enemy will consume the mark to deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} equal to {{as|10% of their '''maximum''' health}}, capped at 300 against epic monsters.

{{sbc|Innate - Frost Armor:}} '''Sejuani''' gains ''Frost Armor'', which lingers for 3 seconds after taking damage from enemy {{tip|champions}} or {{tip|monsters}}. She restores it after {{pp|12 to 6}} without taking damage from them.

{{sbc|Frost Armor:}} '''Sejuani''' gains {{tip|slow-immune|slow immunity}}, {{tip|cripple-immune|cripple immunity}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|10 (+ 50% '''bonus''' armor) '''bonus''' armor}}}}, and {{sti|mr|{{as|10 (+ 50% '''bonus''' magic resistance) '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Icebreaker: Enemies stunned by Sejuani are marked Frozen for the disable's duration. Sejuani's next basic attack or champion ability against a Frozen enemy will consume the mark to deal bonus magic damage equal to 10% of their maximum health, capped at 300 against epic monsters.
Innate - Frost Armor: Sejuani gains Frost Armor, which lingers for 3 seconds after taking damage from enemy champions or monsters. She restores it after 12 âˆ’ 6 (based on level) without taking damage from them.
Frost Armor: Sejuani gains slow immunity, cripple immunity, 10 (+ 50% bonus armor) bonus armor, and 10 (+ 50% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance.
i1.notes:
* Gaining ''Frost Armor'' does not remove any pre-existing {{tip|slow|slows}} or {{tip|cripple|cripples}}.
* ''Icebreaker'' will not trigger if the basic attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Icebreaker's '' interactions with {{tip|dodge|dodging}} and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects via basic attack.
* {{Pending for test}}: {{tip|Spell shield}} interaction with ''Icebreaker''.

q1.name: Arctic_Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ui|Bristle}} {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location until he collides with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies he she passes through and {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for 0.5 seconds.
'''Sejuani''' can cast any of her [[champion ability|abilities]] during ''Arctic Assault's'' dash.
''Arctic Assault will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Bristle dashes to the target location until he collides with an enemy champion, dealing magic damage to enemies he she passes through and knocking them up for 0.5 seconds.
Sejuani can cast any of her champion ability during Arctic Assault's dash.
Arctic Assault will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
q1.notes:
* Champions will slightly be {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}, while [[minion]]s and [[monster]]s will instead be slightly {{tip|airborne|pulled}} for a fixed distance.
* ''Arctic Assault'' cannot {{tip|airborne|knock}} enemies over terrain.
* Casting {{si|Flash}} during ''Arctic Assault'' will end the dash and affect enemies at the new location.
* Upon colliding with an enemy {{Tip|champion}}, Sejuani will {{Tip|basic attack|attack}} them.

w1.name: Winter's_Wrath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds into the cast time, '''Sejuani''' swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} hit.

After the cast time, '''Sejuani''' lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 75% for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
'''Sejuani''' can move while casting ''Winter's Wrath''. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow '''Sejuani's''' movement.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: After 0.25 seconds into the cast time, Sejuani swings her flail in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit and knocks back minions and monsters hit.
After the cast time, Sejuani lashes out with her flail in a line in the same direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 75% for 0.25 seconds.
Sejuani can move while casting Winter's Wrath. Both swings will strike in the cast direction, but their hitboxes follow Sejuani's movement.
leveling: {{st|Swing Damage|{{ap|20 to 40}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{as|(+ 2% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Lash Damage|{{ap|30 to 190}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}} {{as|(+ 6% of her '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|20+30 to 40+190}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% of her '''maximum''' health)}}}}
w1.notes: * {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the swing or the lash.

effects.str: • Swing Damage: (+ 20% AP) (+ 2% of her maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 20% AP) (+ 2% of her maximum health)

effects.str:
• Lash Damage: (+ 60% AP) (+ 6% of her maximum health)
  • Total Damage: (+ 80% AP) (+ 8% of her maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 60% AP) (+ 6% of her maximum health)
(+ 80% AP) (+ 8% of her maximum health)

e1.name: Permafrost
description:
{{sbc|Passive:}} {{ai|Winter's Wrath|Sejuani}} and both '''Sejuani's''' and nearby allied {{tip|melee}} champions' attacks {{tip|on-hit}} apply stacks of ''Frost'' to enemy {{tip|champions}}, medium / large {{tip|monsters}} and large {{tip|minions}} for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Enemies hit by ''Permafrost'' or {{ais|Glacial Prison|Sejuani}} bola have all of their ''Frost'' stacks consumed and cannot be affected by ''Frost'' for 10 seconds.

'''Sejuani''' can cast ''Permafrost'' against an enemy with 4 stacks.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' hurls a trap at the {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy with 4 stacks of ''Frost'' closest to the cursor, which upon arrival deals {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|knockdown|knocks them down}}, and {{tip|stun|stuns}} them for 1 second.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Sejuani's Winter's Wrath and both Sejuani's and nearby allied melee champions' attacks on-hit apply stacks of Frost to enemy champions, medium / large monsters and large minions for 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 4 times. Enemies hit by Permafrost or Sejuani's Glacial Prison bola have all of their Frost stacks consumed and cannot be affected by Frost for 10 seconds.

Sejuani can cast Permafrost against an enemy with 4 stacks.
Active: Sejuani hurls a trap at the visible enemy with 4 stacks of Frost closest to the cursor, which upon arrival deals magic damage, knocks them down, and stuns them for 1 second.
Permafrost resets Sejuani's basic attack timer.
e1.notes:
* ''Permafrost's'' targeting prioritizes champions within 50 of cursor, then non-champions within 50 of cursor, then champions within 350 of cursor, then closest unit to cursor within 2500 (this only applies if there is no target directly under the cursor).
* ''Frost'' stacks will not be applied if the basic attack is {{tip|blocked}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Permafrost's'' stack application interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).
* If the target becomes {{tip|untargetable}}, {{tip|death|dies}}, or is too far away or no longer in {{tip|sight}} during the cast time, this ability will cancel but still go on {{sti|cooldown}} and pay its cost.{{bug}}

r1.name: Glacial_Prison
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sejuani''' throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 1 second.

If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and {{tip|stun|stunning}} for {{fd|1.5}} seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that {{tip|slow|slows}} enemies within by 30% and grants {{tip|sight}} of the area in a smaller radius.

Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and {{tip|slow}} them by 80% for 1 second, as well as {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sejuani throws an ice bola in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy champion, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 1 second.
If the bola travels over 400 units, it becomes empowered to detonate upon reaching maximum range or hitting an enemy champion, dealing increased damage and stunning for 1.5 seconds instead. For the same duration, a frost storm is created that slows enemies within by 30% and grants sight of the area in a smaller radius.
Afterwards, the storm shatters to deal magic damage to enemies hit and slow them by 80% for 1 second, as well as revealing them and granting sight of the area for 0.5 seconds.
The enemy hit by the bola is not affected by the storm's effects.
r1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the primary target and {{tip|area damage}} to secondary targets in the ice storm.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block only a single instance of damage.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* Both areas of effect will be centered on the first champion struck, not at the location the missile collided with them.

effects.str: • Increased Magic Damage: (+ 80% AP)
